<< cosd trigonometric functions cosm >>

cosh

Computes the hyperbolic cosine in radians for each element of x.

Syntax

res = cosh(x)

Input argument

x

a numeric value

Output argument

res

a numeric value

Description

cosh computes the hyperbolic cosine in radians for each element of x.

Example

A = eye(3, 3);
res = cosh(A)

See also

acos, cos.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
